description: Two bizarre goals ensure Barrow and Salford play out a 1-1 draw in League Two at the SO Legal Stadium.
title: Barrow 1-1 Salford City
maintext:
Barrow have failed to win any of their nine Football League games against Salford City (D4 L5), losing both of their last two whilst conceding 3+ goals in the process.
After drawing 0-0 with Barrow on their last visit to Holker Sheet in October 2023, Salford City have now kept three clean sheets across their four away Football League games against the Bluebirds (W2 D2).
Barrow have won each of their last three league games played on a Tuesday, last winning four in a row on this day of the week in November 2022.
Salford have only lost one of their last eight midweek (Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday) away league outings (W3 D4), a 3-1 defeat at Newport in October of this season.
